frontmatter.title: Cherry Emotes | Coffee Series
frontmatter.description: Custom emote solution for non-nitro users. Use animated emotes in your server, even without Nitro. Make your own emote storage spreadsheet and generate emote-like image links for use in DMs and elsewhere.
